references.reason: This paper introduces denoising diffusion probabilistic models (DDPMs), a foundational model class for the work presented.

references.paper_title: Diffusion models beat gans on image synthesis
references.reason: This paper demonstrates the superior performance of diffusion models compared to GANs on image generation tasks, motivating the use of diffusion models in the current work.
This paper introduces classifier-free guidance, a crucial technique for guiding diffusion models without the need for explicit classifiers, a key component in the current work's approach.

references.paper_title: Diffusion posterior sampling for general noisy inverse problems
references.reason: This paper presents a method for training-free guided diffusion, which directly addresses the core challenge of controlling diffusion models without retraining.
This paper introduces DDIM, a more efficient sampling method for diffusion models that improves upon the original DDPM, enhancing the performance and practicality of the proposed method.
